content: I dress very colourful but casual and sporty — feeling good in what I wear is the most important part. Shoes are mostly expensive (around CHF 150 to 200) — I give a shit about dress codes especially for work — I don’t want to feel like I don’t belong cause I don’t feel ok in my clothes — I belong cause I can be me. IF a job wants me to wear blouses, costumes and such it must be an outstanding one but I think what I love to do in life will never force me into such stupidity.
